snippet: Federal investigators plan to join the inquiry into a fire at a Panhandle abortion clinic that has been the site of deadly violence in the past, officials said Monday.
abstract: Federal investigators plan to join inquiry into a fire at an abortion clinic in Pensacola, Fla, that has been the site of deadly violence in the past.
lead_paragraph: Federal investigators plan to join the inquiry into a fire at a Panhandle abortion clinic that has been the site of deadly violence in the past, officials said Monday.

headline.main: Florida: Inquiry Into Abortion Clinic Fire Grows
headline.print_headline: Florida: Inquiry Into Abortion Clinic Fire Grows

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
